comments.body:
Should we not include the `tokenRegex`? I know it's not explicitly documented but it is an argument nonetheless.

```suggestion
    function transformPhrase(phrase: string, options?: number | Polyglot.InterpolationOptions, locale?: string, tokenRegex?: RegExp): string;
```

Afaik the exported version do not take this argument - I suspect it wasn't intentional, but it is how it is right now.

https://github.com/airbnb/polyglot.js/blob/3ca7e08c3771e058155ff9e4c3f289988da1190a/index.js#L384-L386
Ah I didn't check the export, good stuff
